RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Freeze Track
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Allows the user to freeze a track to either reduce CPU usage or for use when VSTs are not available. The tool works by rendering each pattern to a sample and loading them all into a 'frozen track' instrument. Frozen tracks will be muted and replaced by a track that plays the frozen patterns. Autoseek is enabled for frozen pattern samples to enable playback from any location in the song.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Martin Bealby | mxb (mbealby@gmail.com)
